entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon then 30 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 13 April 2023
